title: Royal Allegiance LF Top or Mid Starter for OOL
body:
This is our last shot at trying to make play offs and hopefully Oceanic Challenger Series.

Right now we have dedicated players that are giving it all for what is the three weeks left for this split.

We are currently holding 8th and 9th spot on the ladder and will have to move up into top 8. These teams will then play playoffs to have a shot at promotion matches into OCS

**We are looking for someone:**

Preferably Diamond 1 +
Has working microphone
Has the ability to keep up communication in a team environment ( include relaying proper info , dont have to be always talking)
Constantly looks to improve themselves and everyone around them
Maintains positive atmosphere
Welcomes criticism
Has a the dedication and drive to want to make it to OCS.

if interested add Wolves
